document.query: CREATE TABLE `outgoing_webservices` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `command` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `data_in` longtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `data_out` longtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `status` varchar(25) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `http_code` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `completed_at` datetime , `duration` int(10) , `created_at` datetime , `updated_at` datetime , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
